item.description:
Manchester, New Hampshire- Education Policy Discussion Forum, September 29

Time to be announced, but probably after 6 PM. Call to find out: (603)232-9244

http://www.scholarsac...

Scholars' Academy,
35 Main St.
Hooksett, NH

Scholars Academy, a New Hampshire private school specially designed for gifted children ages 5 to 12, is holding an education policy discussion forum titled “Real Choice in Education: Has the Time Finally Come?” that Gary will be attending.
item.name: Gary Johnson at Educational Forum in Manchester, NH!
